mapper.insert: insert into post (id, categoryId, displayId, title, contents, dateCreated) values(#{id}, #{category.id}, #{displayId}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{dateCreated})
mapper.update: update post set categoryId = #{category.id}, title = #{title}, contents = #{contents} where id = #{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT p.id as id, c.id as "category.displayId", c.title as "category.title", p.displayId as displayId, p.title as title, p.contents as contents, p.dateCreated as dateCreated FROM post p JOIN post_metadata pm on pm.postId = p.id JOIN category c on c.id = p.categoryId
mapper.select: WHERE c.blogId = #{blogId} ORDER BY p.id DESC LIMIT 1
